name: XDAI
public_notice: For information on xDAI Chain STAKE Token, go to https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/xdai-stake

description.en: xDai is the ideal cryptocurrency for everyday payments and transactions. Fees are extremely low, payments are instantaneous, and the value remains stable at ~ $1 US Dollar per xDai. User-friendly tools make xDai easily adoptable for a broad audience (crypto and non-crypto users alike!)
